name: Greater Camera Distance
description:
Allows the vanity and third person cameras to zoom out to 30 meters.

Press ctrl-shift-H to toggle back and forth between "mmo mode".  This centers the camera behind the player instead of off to one side for that mmo feel.  Note that this breaks archery so you should use the over the shoulder camera for archery.

Mod ID is 863041645

Source at https://github.com/Kharzette/ConanMods
author: Kharzette
